alert.note: Alert for Harvey; McPherson; Reno; Rice; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 9:07PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of McPherson, northeastern Reno, northwestern Harvey, eastern Rice and southern Saline Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 907 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Marquette to near Hutchinson. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, Mcpherson, Lindsborg, South Hutchinson, Inman, Buhler, Haven, Burrton, Marquette, Assaria, Windom, Yoder, Falun, Willowbrook, Mcpherson Airport, Hutchinson Airport and Bridgeport. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 56 and 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central and central Kansas.
